message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! While I'm interested, $120 is a bit higher than I'm looking to spend right now.  How about $105?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. $115 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm firm on $110. Let's close this deal!
I understand you're sticking to your guns, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $112.50. It's the lowest I'm willing to go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. How about we split the difference and settle on $111.25?  It's a fair price for both of us.
I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. I can sell the product to you for $112.00. It's the best I can do.
